lock off:
confirm lock off
retry = 2
lock off first
set remaining\LOCKING OFF

status ack lock not opened remaining = 0:
retry - 1
lock off first
set remaining\

start cool down timer
scan board\COOL DOWN

status ack lock opened:
start cool down timer
scan board\COOL DOWN
status ack lock not opened remaining = 0:
retry - 1
lock off first
set remaining\LOCKING OFF

start cool down timer
scan board\COOL DOWN
timeout:
start cool down timer
scan board\COOL DOWN
